attributes.action: have MPs who have made improper expenses claims investigated by the Metropolitan Police for potential crminal offences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The actions of some MPs concerning their expenses is now clearly so suspicious, that if they were ordinary members of the public they would be investigated by the police for criminal deception and kindred offences. MPs have stated on many occasions that they are not above the law. I therefore cannot understand why they are not being investigated by police for obtaining property (money) by deception, fraud, false accounting and misconduct in public office etc. In the interests of justice, democracy and public accountability they should be investigated by the police and criminal charges brought in appropriate cases.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
